attributes.action: Please ban fluoride from babies’ powdered milk formulas.
attributes.additional_details:
These are the facts:
Every brand of babies’ powdered milk formula now has fluoride added; it’s inescapable.
The Gestapo fluoridated the water in the concentration camps; it was certainly not added for dental health, it makes people docile & subservient.
Sodium fluoride is often used as rat poison because of its odourless & tasteless killing power.
No study has ever proven that this rat poison is good for teeth.
Studies show that it’s bad for every part of the body, has absolutely no health benefits whatsoever, & particularly in the developing brain of a baby it's primarily going to severely reduce I.Q. & should never be given to a baby under any circumstances.
Babies' teeth fall out anyway & begin to get replaced by their adult teeth by the time their brains have developed.
A simple internet search for “fluoride causes” is all that is required for a glimpse at the overwhelmingly grim & inevitable consequences of fluoride ingestion.
